Reviews.Title: NOT COOL!
Reviews.Author: Tre
Reviews.Content: First time ordering a phone from amazon and they sold me a stolen phone. My nephew went to turn it on with sprint and they said NO WE CANT THIS PHONE IS STOLEN! I. Am livid and my nephew is aggregated. I am working on getting my money back now. $319.98 to be exact. I work too hard and put up with too much to let this go. That's my review!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone - Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Childs "Helios_AI"
Reviews.Content: When I managed to break my old S3 attempting to swap out cracked glass I was concerned that I wouldn't be able to find a reasonably priced replacement to get me through until my next upgrade.Fortunately this seller had an identical replacement (the only difference being the logo on the back cover) at a very reasonable price.  I hesitated because it was as low as it was, but decided to give it a shot, and was rewarded by a well packed, promptly shipped, and perfectly functioning phone - just as described.I would definitely consider purchasing from this seller again (and would recommend them to others).

Reviews.Title: Really love the system
Reviews.Author: Analise
Reviews.Content: A little bit of blemishes on the case but so little I couldn't notice at first. Screen is wonderfully clear and operating system works great. I so love this phone! Thanks so much for having such a like-new phone at such a good price. Definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected.
Reviews.Author: K Hatch, Benicia, CA
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Galaxy S3 and I am very disappointed. I bought this phone as "new" and appeared so when it arrived in a sealed box. When I took it to Sprint to have it activated, we discovered that the phone had been rooted and a very distasteful bootanimation had been downloaded on it. A rooted phone loses any warranty with Samsung and is very difficult to "unroot". This should have been disclosed in the description

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: German Giovanni Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The phone was in great shape and I got exactly what I wanted and it got to me during the expected time... I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Like Brand New!
Reviews.Author: Rock J
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item  because a friend's son lost his Samsung Galaxy II and Sprint's Insurance Plan is garbage.  I got it earlier than was told.  It came in excellent condition.  The seller really under sold this item.  It was to my surprise brand new with just one small blemish on the corner you can't even notice unless you look with a magnifying glass,  Excellent purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Bought mine from TheBlueDot
Reviews.Author: (Michelle)
Reviews.Content: I'll change this rating when they send me the correct phone. I requested a Blue Samsung Galaxy S3 on the Sprint network. I received a Black Samsung Galaxy S2 on AT&T.; Return pending now. Depending on the way they conduct themselves from now on, I can change this to four stars. One star is already docked forever for sending me something completely different from what I bought. The quality of the received phone is excellent, however, at least from what I can tell not turning the thing on.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Raiza Rujano
Reviews.Content: The phone arrive goodexcelentRecivier is in perfect condition, as I expected, I am grateful.Good condition, protection and quality

Reviews.Author: Nova Amor
Reviews.Content: I love my phone. It came with no flaws. And it was very pretty<3 I'm in love! Oh... I did not get a "stolen" phone.
